1.text: Inspect the physical appearance of your car's battery before jump-starting.

2.text: Wear safety goggles and rubber gloves before touching the dead car battery in any way.

3.text: Verify that the cables attached to your car's battery are secure and free of corrosion.
3.vid: /5/57/Charge a Dead Car Battery Step 3 Version 9.360p.mp4

4.text: Drive the functional car into position next to the car with the dead battery without allowing the vehicles to touch one another.
4.vid: /4/4b/Charge a Dead Car Battery Step 4 Version 9.360p.mp4

5.text: Turn off the functional car that contains the charged battery.
5.vid: /e/e4/Charge a Dead Car Battery Step 5 Version 9.360p.mp4

6.text: Open the hood or compartment on each vehicle in which the batteries are located.
6.vid: /f/f9/Charge a Dead Car Battery Step 6 Version 9.360p.mp4

7.text: Take note of the positive and negative terminals on each battery.

8.text: Connect each end of the positive jumper cable to the positive terminals on each car battery.

9.text: Connect one end of the negative jumper cable to the negative terminal on the functional, charged battery.
9.vid: /c/c3/Charge a Dead Car Battery Step 9 Version 9.360p.mp4

10.text: Attach the other end of the negative jumper cable to a grounded metal component of the car that contains the dead battery.
10.vid: /c/cb/Charge a Dead Car Battery Step 10 Version 9.360p.mp4

11.text: Start the engine of the car with the charged battery.
11.vid: /c/c5/Charge a Dead Car Battery Step 11 Version 9.360p.mp4

12.text: Allow at least five minutes to pass after starting the engine of the car with the charged battery.
12.vid: /f/fb/Charge a Dead Car Battery Step 12 Version 9.360p.mp4

13.text: Try to start the engine of the car that contains the dead battery.

14.text: Disconnect and remove the jumper cables from each car after the engine has started in the reverse order in which you connected them.
14.vid: /7/78/Charge a Dead Car Battery Step 14 Version 9.360p.mp4

15.text: Allow the car which had the dead battery to continue running for at least another five minutes.

16.text: Drive the jump-started car for at least 20 minutes or allow it to idle for the same amount of time.
16.vid: /3/3b/Charge a Dead Car Battery Step 16 Version 9.360p.mp4
